name: manga-shelf
description: Private books/manga shelf - Angular 20 + Node 20/Express + TypeScript

scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c green,magenta "npm run dev -w app/backend" "npm run dev -w app/frontend"
scripts.dev:win: concurrently -n api,web -c green,magenta "cross-env-shell PORT=3001 npm run dev -w app/backend" "npm exec -w app/frontend -- ng serve --port 4300"
scripts.build: npm run build -w app/frontend && npm run build -w app/backend
